ValidationRule.description: Verify if PEO client, PEO is selected as the product. Conversely, if non-PEO client, PEO is not allowed as the product
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')),RecordType.Name ="Sales2Service Case", OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "PEO"),NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "PEO Client"),Account.Payroll_Branch_Nbr__c =741,BEGINS(Account.Other_PEO_Client_Number__c,'0741')))), AND(ISPICKVAL(Product__c, "Payroll"),OR(ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "PEO Client"),Account.Payroll_Branch_Nbr__c =741 ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Be sure to select the appropriate product. For PEO payroll issues, select PEO and select Payroll for everyone else. Not to be used for Prism PEO.
